taskGroup.name: Start with
taskGroup.intro: This cheat sheet guides you through the creation of an analysis.

task.name: Create a database connection
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a database connection.

task.name: Create a connection analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a database content analysis.

task.name: Create a catalog analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a Catalog Analysis.

task.name: Create a schema analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a Schema Analysis.

task.name: Create a column analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a column analysis.

task.name: Create a columns comparison analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a Column Comparison Analysis.

task.name: Create a numerical correlation analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a Numerical Column Correlation Analysis.

task.name: Create a user defined indicator
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a User Defined Indicator.

task.name: Create an MDM connection
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a MDM connection.

task.name: Create a column set analysis
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an analysis of the content of a set of columns. The analysis computes the row count, distinct count, unique count and duplicate count

task.name: Create a functional dependency analysis
task.intro: This analysis helps you to detect anomalies in your column dependencies.

task.name: Create a business rule analysis
task.intro: This kind of analysis enables you to apply your Business Rules to a selected table.

task.name: Create an SQL pattern
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an sql pattern.

task.name: Create a regular expresion pattern
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an regex pattern.

task.name: Create a business rule
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an Business Rule.

task.name: Create an SQL source file
task.intro: This tutorial guides you through the creation of an source file.
